0.text: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.

1.text: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).

2.text: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, causing his basic attacks  on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest  visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.

0.text: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units.

1.text: During this time, Volibear's next basic attack has an  uncancellable windup and  pounces on the target, dealing bonus physical damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

2.text: If Volibear becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.

3.text: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

4.text: Thundering Smash  resets Volibear's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.

1.text: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals  50% increased damage and  heals Volibear. The heal is halved against  minions.

2.text: Frenzied Maul applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Volibear summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. This can hit Volibear, which  shields him for 14% of his maximum health (+ 75% AP) for 3 seconds.

1.text: The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions,  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants  sight of the area for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Volibear gains Stormbringer for 12 seconds and  leaps to the target location with  crowd control immunity, granting  sight of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.

1.text: Stormbringer: Volibear gains  ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on  Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.

2.text: Volibear impacts after 1 second,  slowing nearby enemies by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt  physical damage.

3.text: Volibear also disables enemy  turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same  physical damage.

4.text: Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that.  Thundering Smash's duration will be paused for the  leap.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • Green Potion

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+25 armor
+25 magic resistance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supercharged: For 4 seconds, grants 40% bonus movement speed and ghosting when moving towards a turret or visible enemy champion within 2000 units. After the duration or when an enemy champion is within 225 units, you emit a shockwave, slowing enemy champions within 450 range by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – SUPERCHARGED: For 4 seconds, grants 40% bonus movement speed and  ghosting when moving towards a  turret or  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units. After the duration or when an enemy champion is within 225 units, you emit a shockwave,  slowing enemy champions within  450 range by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Refuel: Moving and taking damage fills up the Chemtank, gaining stacks. Gain 5 stacks per instance of damage taken from champions and large monsters per cast instance and 1 stack for every 25 units travelled, capped at 10 stacks when travelling by dashes or blinks. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals 40 − 120 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health) (+ 3% movement speed) magic damage to all nearby enemies, increased by 30% against minions and 200% against monsters.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 50 bonus health, and 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REFUEL: Moving and taking damage fills up the Chemtank, gaining stacks. Gain 5 stacks per instance of damage taken from champions and large monsters per cast instance and 1 stack for every 25 units travelled, capped at 10 stacks when travelling by dashes or blinks. At 100 stacks, your next basic attack deals 40 − 120 (based on level) (+ 1% maximum health) (+ 3% movement speed) magic damage to all nearby enemies, increased by 30% against minions and 200% against monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health
+45 armor
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks on-hit to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

+350 health

+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  800

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • fon

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  +  1000

Passive

passive.originText: UNIQUE – BOUNDLESS VITALITY: Increases all  healing and  shielding received by 25%.

1.originHTML: +  +  850

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • sv

0.text: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.

1.text: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).

2.text: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, causing his basic attacks  on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest  visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.

0.text: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units.

1.text: During this time, Volibear's next basic attack has an  uncancellable windup and  pounces on the target, dealing bonus physical damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

2.text: If Volibear becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.

3.text: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

4.text: Thundering Smash  resets Volibear's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.

1.text: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals  50% increased damage and  heals Volibear. The heal is halved against  minions.

2.text: Frenzied Maul applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Volibear summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. This can hit Volibear, which  shields him for 14% of his maximum health (+ 75% AP) for 3 seconds.

1.text: The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions,  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants  sight of the area for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Volibear gains Stormbringer for 12 seconds and  leaps to the target location with  crowd control immunity, granting  sight of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.

1.text: Stormbringer: Volibear gains  ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on  Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.

2.text: Volibear impacts after 1 second,  slowing nearby enemies by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt  physical damage.

3.text: Volibear also disables enemy  turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same  physical damage.

4.text: Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that.  Thundering Smash's duration will be paused for the  leap.

Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.
Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.
The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions,  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants  sight of the area for 1 second.
Stormbringer: Volibear gains  ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on  Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.
Volibear impacts after 1 second,  slowing nearby enemies by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt  physical damage.
Volibear also disables enemy  turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same  physical damage.

2.concerningText: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals  50% increased damage and  heals Volibear. The heal is halved against  minions.
